title: STAT+: ‘Remarkable’ drug results against an aggressive leukemia
description: At the end of a tense year for science, the American Society of Hematology heard promising data on acute myeloid leukemia, Von Willebrand disease and more.
content: At the end of a tense year for science, the American Society of Hematology heard promising data on acute myeloid leukemia, Von Willebrand disease and more.
